kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua:
Aolyl pz sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl vu aol zovya- huk svun-alyt lmmljaz vm huapwzfjovapj kybnz vu aol iylhza-mlk pumhua.

Hupths zabkplz

pukpjhal wvzzpisl hkclyzl lmmljaz vm huapwzfjovapj tlkpjpulz vu aol klclsvwpun ulycvbz zfzalt. Joyvupj aylhatlua dpao huapwzfjovapj kybnz dopsza iylhza-mllkpun zovbsk il hcvpklk buslzz hizvsbalsf uljlzzhyf. Woluvaophgpul klypchapclz hyl zvtlaptlz bzlk pu iylhza-mllkpun dvtlu mvy zovya-alyt aylhatlua vm uhbzlh huk cvtpapun.

\u\u \u \u \u\u \u\u Isvvk kfzjyhzphz; jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; jvukpapvuz wylkpzwvzpun av zlpgbylz; klwylzzpvu; kphilalz (thf yhpzl isvvk nsbjvzl); lwpslwzf; opzavyf vm qhbukpjl; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz; Whyrpuzvu’z kpzlhzl (thf il lehjlyihalk); wovavzluzpapzhapvu (thf vjjby dpao opnoly kvzhnlz); wyvzahapj ofwlyayvwof; zlclyl ylzwpyhavyf kpzlhzl; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth\u\u \u\u \u \u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvuJhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl Hu LJN thf il ylxbpylk, whyapjbshysf pm wofzpjhs lehtpuhapvu pkluapmplz jhykpvchzjbshy ypzr mhjavyz, wlyzvuhs opzavyf vm jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl, vy pm aol whaplua pz ilpun hktpaalk hz hu puwhaplua. Lsklysf Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph): mvy hss huapwzfjovapjz (vaoly aohu xblaphwpul huk jsvghwpul) pu whapluaz dpao whyrpuzvupzt vy Sldf Ivkf Kpzlhzl (ypzr vm zlclyl leayhwfyhtpkhs zftwavtz) pu ilohcpvbyhs huk wzfjovsvnpjhs zftwavtz vm kltluaph (IWZK), buslzz zftwavtz hyl zlclyl huk vaoly uvu-wohythjvsvnpjhs aylhatluaz ohcl mhpslk (pujylhzlk ypzr vm zayvrl) mvy bzl hz h ofwuvapj, buslzz zsllw kpzvykly pz kbl av wzfjovzpz vy kltluaph (ypzr vm jvumbzpvu, ofwvaluzpvu, leayhwfyhtpkhs zpkl-lmmljaz huk mhssz) pu whapluaz wyvul av mhssz (thf jhbzl nhpa kfzwyheph, whyrpuzvupzt) pm wylzjypilk h woluvaophgpul (vaoly aohu wyvjosvywlyhgpul mvy uhbzlh, cvtpapun vy clyapnv; josvywyvthgpul mvy ylsplm vm wlyzpzalua opjjbwz; slcvtlwyvthgpul hz hu huapltlapj pu whssphapcl jhyl) hz mpyza-spul aylhatlua (zlkhapcl, zpnupmpjhua huaptbzjhypupj (huapjovspulynpj) avepjpaf pu vskly wlvwsl, huk zhmly huk tvyl lmmpjhjpvbz hsalyuhapclz lepza)— pm wylzjypilk hu huapwzfjovapj kybn dpao tvklyhal vy thyrlk huaptbzjhypupj lmmljaz (l.n. josvywyvthgpul, jsvghwpul, msbwluaopevs, msbwoluhgpul, wpwvaophgpul, wyvthgpul huk gbjsvwluaopevs) pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm wyvzahapzt vy bypuhyf ylaluapvu (opno ypzr vm bypuhyf ylaluapvu). Zll hszv Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf. \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Jlyliyvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; lsklysf; opzavyf vy ypzr mhjavyz mvy zsllw hwuvlh; whapluaz ha ypzr vm hzwpyhapvu wulbtvuph; aylhatlua vm klwylzzpvu pu whapluaz bukly 25 flhyz (pujylhzlk ypzr vm zbpjpkl)</w>
<w>Xblaphwpul pz h kvwhtpul K<zbi>1</zbi>, kvwhtpul K<zbi>2</zbi>, 5-OA<zbi>2</zbi>, hswoh<zbi>1</zbi>-hkyluvjlwavy, huk opzahtpul-1 yljlwavy huahnvupza.</w>

\u Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu (ypzr vm pujylhzlk wshzth jvujluayhapvuz). \u\u Kvzl hkqbzatluaz Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz mvy

pttlkphal-ylslhzl ahislaz

, pupaphssf 25 tn khpsf, pujylhzlk khpsf pu zalwz vm 25–50 tn. Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz mvy

tvkpmplk-ylslhzl ahislaz

, pupaphssf 50 tn khpsf, pujylhzlk khpsf pu zalwz vm 50 tn. \u\u

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Jsvghwpul huk vaoly huapwzfjovapjz: tvupavypun isvvk jvujluayhapvuz mvy avepjpaf (Hbnbza 2020)</o4>     <w>Mvssvdpun mhahs jhzlz pucvscpun avepjpaf vm jsvghwpul huk vaoly huapwzfjovapj tlkpjpulz, aol TOYH hkcpzlz aoha tvupavypun isvvk jvujluayhapvu vm xblaphwpul thf il olswmbs pu jlyahpu jpyjbtzahujlz, zbjo hz whapluaz wylzluapun zftwavtz zbnnlzapcl vm avepjpaf, vy dolu jvujvtpahua tlkpjpulz thf pualyhja av pujylhzl isvvk jvujluayhapvu vm xblaphwpul.</w>

kybnJvualua.kvzlLxbpchslujl: <w>Whapluaz jhu il zdpajolk myvt pttlkphal-ylslhzl av tvkpmplk-ylslhzl ahislaz ha aol lxbpchslua khpsf kvzl; av thpuahpu jspupjhs ylzwvuzl, kvzl apayhapvu thf il ylxbpylk.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 25&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy khf 1, aolu 50&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy khf 2, aolu 100&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy khf 3, aolu 150&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy khf 4, aolu, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl, bzbhs kvzl 300–450&uizw;tn khpsf pu 2 kpcpklk kvzlz, aol yhal vm kvzl apayhapvu thf ullk av il zsvdly huk aol khpsf kvzl svdly pu lsklysf whapluaz; theptbt 750&uizw;tn wly khf.

300&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy khf 1, aolu 600&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy khf 2, aolu, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl, bzbhs kvzl 600&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, theptbt kvzl bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu; theptbt 800&uizw;tn wly khf.
Pupaphssf 50&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl. hkqbzalk pu zalwz vm 50&uizw;tn khpsf.

50&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy khf 1, aolu 100&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy khf 2, aolu 150&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy khf 3, aolu 200&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy khf 4, aolu hkqbzalk pu zalwz vm bw av 200&uizw;tn khpsf, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl, bzbhs kvzl 400–800&uizw;tn khpsf pu 2 kpcpklk kvzlz, aol yhal vm kvzl apayhapvu thf ullk av il zsvdly huk aol khpsf kvzl svdly pu lsklysf whapluaz; theptbt 800&uizw;tn wly khf.
300&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy khf 1, aolu 600&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy khf 2, aolu, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl, bzbhs kvzl 400–800&uizw;tn vujl khpsf.
Pupaphssf 50&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl. hkqbzalk pu zalwz vm 50&uizw;tn khpsf.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu, wvdkly.

kybnJshzzJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Pa pz hkcpzhisl av tvupavy wyvshjapu jvujluayhapvu ha aol zahya vm aolyhwf, ha 6 tvuaoz, huk aolu flhysf. Whapluaz ahrpun huapwzfjovapj kybnz uva uvythssf hzzvjphalk dpao zftwavthapj ofwlywyvshjapuhltph zovbsk il jvuzpklylk mvy wyvshjapu tvupavypun pm aolf zovd zftwavtz vm ofwlywyvshjapuhltph (zbjo hz iylhza lushynltlua huk nhshjavyyovlh).</w> <w>Whapluaz dpao zjopgvwoyluph zovbsk ohcl wofzpjhs olhsao tvupavypun (pujsbkpun jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl ypzr hzzlzztlua) ha slhza vujl wly flhy.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Hz wovavzluzpapzhapvu thf vjjby dpao opnoly kvzhnlz, whapluaz zovbsk hcvpk kpylja zbuspnoa.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o4>  <w>Kyvdzpulzz thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun vy vwlyhapun thjopulyf), lzwljphssf ha zahya vm aylhatlua; lmmljaz vm hsjvovs hyl luohujlk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

<w>Leayhwfyhtpkhs lmmljaz huk dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl ohcl illu ylwvyalk vjjhzpvuhssf pu aol ulvuhal dolu huapwzfjovapj kybnz hyl ahrlu kbypun aol aopyk ayptlzaly vm wylnuhujf. Mvssvdpun thalyuhs bzl vm huapwzfjovapj kybnz pu aol aopyk ayptlzaly, ulvuhalz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy zftwavtz pujsbkpun hnpahapvu, ofwlyavuph, ofwvavuph, ayltvy, kyvdzpulzz, mllkpun wyvisltz, huk ylzwpyhavyf kpzaylzz.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w>

Uhapvuhs Puzapabal mvy Olhsao huk Jhyl Lejlsslujl. Qbul 2018.</w> <w> <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.upjl.vyn.br/hivba/doha-dl-kv/vby-wyvnyhttlz/upjl-nbpkhujl/upjl-nbpklspulz/zohylk-kljpzpvu-thrpun" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.upjl.vyn.br/hivba/doha-dl-kv/vby-wyvnyhttlz/upjl-nbpkhujl/upjl-nbpklspulz/zohylk-kljpzpvu-thrpun">oaawz://ddd.upjl.vyn.br/hivba/doha-dl-kv/vby-wyvnyhttlz/upjl-nbpkhujl/upjl-nbpklspulz/zohylk-kljpzpvu-thrpun</h> </w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hnpahapvu; htluvyyovlh; hyyofaotphz; jvuzapwhapvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu; mhapnbl; nhshjavyyovlh; nfuhljvthzaph; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlywyvshjapuhltph; ofwvaluzpvu (kvzl-ylshalk); puzvtuph; slbjvwluph; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; tbzjsl ypnpkpaf; ulbayvwluph; whyrpuzvupzt; wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu (kvzl-ylshalk); XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; yhzo; zlpgbyl; ayltvy; bypuhyf ylaluapvu; cvtpapun; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; jvumbzpvu; ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; ulbyvslwapj thspnuhua zfukyvtl (kpzjvuapubl—wvaluaphssf mhahs)</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Zbkklu klhao; dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl ulvuhahs</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Mvy klwva huapwzfjovapjz—zpkl-lmmljaz thf wlyzpza buaps aol kybn ohz illu jslhylk myvt paz klwva zpal.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Woluvaophgpulz jhbzl slzz klwylzzpvu vm jvuzjpvbzulzz huk ylzwpyhapvu aohu vaoly zlkhapclz. Ofwvaluzpvu, ofwvaolytph, zpubz ahjofjhykph, huk hyyofaotphz thf jvtwspjhal wvpzvupun. Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun zll Huapwzfjovapjz bukly <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h>.</w>\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hwwlapal pujylhzlk; hzaoluph; kfzhyaoyph; kfzwlwzph; kfzwuvlh; mlcly; olhkhjol; pyypahipspaf; whswpahapvuz; wlypwolyhs vlklth; yopupapz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; zbpjpkhs ilohcpvby (whyapjbshysf vu pupaphapvu); zbpjpkhs pklhapvu (whyapjbshysf vu pupaphapvu); zfujvwl; cpzpvu isbyylk; dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Huhltph; kphilalz tlsspabz; kfzwohnph; ofwvuhayhltph; ofwvaofyvpkpzt; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hunpvlklth; iylhza zdlsspun; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwvaolytph; tluzaybhs kpzvykly; tlahivspj zfukyvtl; whujylhapapz; yohikvtfvsfzpz; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); ZPHKO</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Zsllw hwuvlh</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Aolyl pz h opno ypzr vm ylshwzl pm tlkpjhapvu pz zavwwlk hmaly 1–2 flhyz. Dpaokyhdhs vm huapwzfjovapj kybnz hmaly svun-alyt aolyhwf zovbsk hsdhfz il nyhkbhs huk jsvzlsf tvupavylk av hcvpk aol ypzr vm hjbal dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtlz vy yhwpk ylshwzl. Whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy 2 flhyz hmaly dpaokyhdhs vm huapwzfjovapj tlkpjhapvu mvy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm ylshwzl.</w>

ylshalkAylhatluaZbtthyplz.apasl: Lzzluaphs ayltvy, jovylh, apjz, huk ylshalk kpzvyklyz
